arguments.value: Clone must be initialized only once.

nodes.documentation:
@dev Initialize the Proxy clone with default values.
@param _owner An address that orders forwarding of transactions.
nodes.name: initialize

nodes.documentation: @dev Payable fallback to accept incoming payments.

@dev Change the owner of this proxy.  Used when the user forgets their key, and we can recover it via SSSS split key.  This will be the final txn of the forgotten key as it transfers ownership of the proxy to the new replacement key.  Note that this is also callable by the contract itself, which would be used in the case that a user is changing their owner address via a metatxn
@param _newOwner An `address` of the new proxy owner.
nodes.name: changeOwner

getHash

changeOwner(address).details: Change the owner of this proxy.  Used when the user forgets their key, and we can recover it via SSSS split key.  This will be the final txn of the forgotten key as it transfers ownership of the proxy to the new replacement key.  Note that this is also callable by the contract itself, which would be used in the case that a user is changing their owner address via a metatxn

params._newOwner: An `address` of the new proxy owner.

forward(bytes,address,address,uint256,by.details: Forward a meta transaction to the destination address.

params._data: A `bytes` data array of the given transaction.
params._destination: An `address` where txn should be forwarded to.
params._signature: A `bytes` array cotaining signature generated by owner.
params._value: An `uint` of Wei value to be sent out.

forwardFromOwner(address,uint256,bytes).details: Forward a regular (non meta) transaction to the destination address.

params._data: A `bytes` data array of the given transaction.
params._destination: An `address` where txn should be forwarded to.
params._value: An `uint` of Wei value to be sent out.

getHash(address,address,uint256,bytes).details: Returns hash for the given transaction.

params._data: A `bytes` data array of the given transaction.
params._destination: An `address` where txn should be forwarded to.
params._value: An `uint` of Wei value to be sent out.

getHash(address,address,uint256,bytes).return: A `bytes32` hash calculated for all incoming parameters.

initialize(address).details: Initialize the Proxy clone with default values.

params._owner: An address that orders forwarding of transactions.

withdraw(address,uint256).details: Withdraw given amount of wei to the specified address.

params._to: An `address` of where to send the wei.
params._value: An `uint` amount to withdraw from the contract balance.

withdrawERC20Token(address,address,uint2.details: Withdraw any ERC20 tokens from the contract balance to owner's address.

params._to: An `address` of where to send the tokens.
